function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Collaborate with other research teams to increase sample size and cross-validate results","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Enforcement of social distancing measures and use of protective gear","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wearing masks, practicing
